items.name: Dino Jungle Lagos
items.short_description: Roam with life-sized animatronic dinosaurs in a lush, prehistoric setting. Kids can excavate fossils and learn about ancient creatures.
items.address: Plot 1, Lekki-Epe Expressway, Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos

items.name: Prehistoric Park Adventure
items.short_description: An interactive park featuring baby dinosaur petting zones, virtual reality dino rides, and a thrilling treetop walkway.
items.address: 45 Victoria Arobieke Street, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Reptile Ridge Safari
items.short_description: Discover life-sized dinosaur models hidden along a jungle trail, complete with sound effects and a fossil digging sandbox for young paleontologists.
items.address: Near Freedom Park, Broad Street, Lagos Island, Lagos

items.name: Jurassic Coast Kids
items.short_description: A themed playground with dinosaur-shaped slides, climbing frames, and an educational center showcasing the Mesozoic Era.
items.address: Plot 24, Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Enchanted Forest of Lagos
items.short_description: Step into a magical realm where classic fairy tale characters come to life, offering interactive shows and story time sessions amidst whimsical gardens.
items.address: Oba Elegushi Road, Lekki, Lagos

items.name: Princess & Dragon Land
items.short_description: A vibrant park dedicated to princesses, knights, and friendly dragons, featuring themed rides, costume dress-up, and medieval games.
items.address: Block B, Plot 5, Banana Island, Ikoyi, Lagos

items.name: Wizzy's Wonderland
items.short_description: An imaginative world inspired by 'Alice in Wonderland', with mazes, tea parties, and optical illusions that challenge perception.
items.address: 12 Acme Road, Ikeja, Lagos

items.name: Gnome's Grove Garden
items.short_description: A charming, smaller park where children can explore miniature houses, discover hidden gnomes, and participate in nature-themed crafts.
items.address: Admiralty Way, Off Freedom Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Lagos Mini Champs Stadium
items.short_description: A multi-sport complex designed for children, offering mini football pitches, basketball courts, and track & field activities with professional coaching.
items.address: 34 Bourdillon Road, Ikoyi, Lagos

items.name: Ikoyi Kids Sports Hub
items.short_description: Focusing on younger children, this hub provides age-appropriate equipment for gymnastics, mini-tennis, and martial arts introductory classes.
items.address: 17 Femi Okunnu Road, Ikoyi, Lagos

items.name: Victory Play Arena
items.short_description: An indoor mini sports arena perfect for all weather, offering dodgeball, soft play areas, and indoor soccer leagues for kids of all ages.
items.address: Shoprite Jakande, Lekki-Epe Expy, Lagos

items.name: Little Legends Sports Park
items.short_description: An outdoor park with various mini-pitches for street hockey, handball, and an obstacle course to develop agility and teamwork.
items.address: Ikeja City Mall, Alausa, Ikeja, Lagos

items.name: Mystical Minds Theater
items.short_description: Witness mind-bending illusions and classic magic tricks performed by Lagos's top family-friendly magicians. Audience participation is key!
items.address: Silverbird Galleria, 133 Ahmadu Bello Way, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Lagos Illusion Palace
items.short_description: A dedicated venue for grand illusion performances, featuring levitations, disappearances, and interactive magic workshops for kids.
items.address: Plot 10, City of David Road, Oniru, Lekki, Lagos

items.name: Grand Magic Matinee
items.short_description: Enjoy a captivating afternoon of close-up magic, card tricks, and comedic acts suitable for all ages, often with special guest magicians.
items.address: Terra Kulture, Tiamiyu Savage St, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Enigma Entertainment Show
items.short_description: A dynamic show blending magic with storytelling and interactive elements, designed to spark wonder and curiosity in young audiences.
items.address: The Muson Centre, 8/9 Marina, Onikan, Lagos Island, Lagos

items.name: African Tales Park
items.short_description: Immerse yourselves in vibrant African folklore with live performances, puppet shows, and interactive storytelling sessions under ancient trees.
items.address: National Arts Theatre, Iganmu, Lagos

items.name: Whispering Woods Storyland
items.short_description: A serene park designed for quiet contemplation and imaginative play, where storytellers share tales and children can create their own narratives.
items.address: Lekki Conservation Centre Road, Lekki, Lagos

items.name: Fables & Friends Garden
items.short_description: A colorful garden filled with sculptures of beloved storybook characters, offering guided storytelling walks and interactive scavenger hunts.
items.address: Tafawa Balewa Square, Onikan, Lagos Island, Lagos

items.name: The Storyteller's Corner
items.short_description: An intimate indoor and outdoor space dedicated to sharing global myths and legends through dramatic readings, music, and craft activities.
items.address: The Metaphor, 78 Ogunlana Drive, Surulere, Lagos

items.name: Splash Island Kids Resort
items.short_description: A fantastic water park exclusively for kids, featuring safe splash pads, mini slides, and a lazy river designed for young adventurers.
items.address: KM 22, Lekki-Epe Expressway, Ajah, Lagos

items.name: Wet N' Wild Lagos Jr.
items.short_description: Smaller scale water attractions including a wave pool, toddler-friendly slides, and water cannons, perfect for a sunny day out.
items.address: 4 Block L, Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Aqua Adventure Land
items.short_description: Experience thrilling water rides and an elaborate water playground with tipping buckets and interactive fountains, all designed for kids' safety.
items.address: Shoprite Ikeja, Obafemi Awolowo Way, Ikeja, Lagos

items.name: Tidal Fun Zone
items.short_description: A compact water play area featuring shallow pools, mini sprinklers, and fun water games, ideal for very young children.
items.address: Eko Atlantic City, Ahmadu Bello Way, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Bricky Builders Bay
items.short_description: An expansive indoor park filled with LEGO bricks of all sizes, offering free play zones, building challenges, and a master builder workshop.
items.address: Maryland Mall, Ikorodu Road, Maryland, Lagos

items.name: Lagos Block Kingdom
items.short_description: Journey through themed worlds built entirely from blocks, featuring interactive displays, a LEGO train ride, and brick-themed playgrounds.
items.address: Centro Mall, Admiralty Way, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Master Builder's Workshop
items.short_description: A hands-on center where children can learn advanced building techniques, participate in robotics challenges, and display their creations.
items.address: The Palms Shopping Mall, Bisola Durosinmi Etti Dr, Lekki, Lagos

items.name: Construct & Play City
items.short_description: An imaginative city scape built with large construction blocks, allowing kids to build and demolish structures, fostering engineering skills.
items.address: 29 Bode Thomas St, Surulere, Lagos

items.name: Lagos Quest Masters
items.short_description: Embark on thrilling indoor and outdoor quests with puzzles, riddles, and physical challenges designed for team-building and critical thinking.
items.address: Landmark Event Centre, Water Corporation Road, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Treasure Trove Challenge
items.short_description: Follow maps and clues to uncover hidden treasures in a meticulously designed themed environment, perfect for pirates and explorers.
items.address: Chaka Leisure Park, Badagry Expressway, Lagos

items.name: Mystery Manor Escape
items.short_description: A family-friendly escape room experience where kids solve mysteries and uncover secrets within a haunted manor themed setting.
items.address: Jhalobia Recreation Park, Murtala Muhammed Airport Rd, Lagos

items.name: Jungle Explorer Mission
items.short_description: An outdoor adventure course with ropes, bridges, and zip lines, where kids navigate a 'jungle' to complete a mission and find artifacts.
items.address: Lekki-Epe Expressway, Adjacent Chevron, Lagos

items.name: Starlight Kids Observatory
items.short_description: A child-friendly planetarium offering immersive dome shows about stars, planets, and constellations, perfect for budding astronomers.
items.address: University of Lagos, Akoka, Yaba, Lagos

items.name: Cosmos Junior Dome
items.short_description: Experience breathtaking virtual journeys through space in a state-of-the-art digital dome, with interactive exhibits on space exploration.
items.address: Lagos State University, Badagry Expressway, Ojo, Lagos

items.name: Galactic Explorers Hub
items.short_description: Beyond the dome, this hub features hands-on activities, build-your-own rocket workshops, and displays of meteorites and space artifacts.
items.address: Nigerian Air Force Base, Ikeja, Lagos

items.name: Astro Kids Planetarium
items.short_description: Educational shows tailored for different age groups, exploring lunar cycles, planetary missions, and the magic of the night sky.
items.address: Civic Centre, Ozumba Mbadiwe Ave, Victoria Island, Lagos

items.name: Invento Kids Lab
items.short_description: A dynamic science center where children conduct safe experiments, build gadgets, and explore principles of physics and chemistry hands-on.
items.address: Shoprite Circle Mall, Jakande, Lekki-Epe Expy, Lagos

items.name: Discovery Zone Lagos
items.short_description: Interactive exhibits cover biology, technology, and engineering, with engaging displays and workshops for children of all ages.
items.address: National Museum, Onikan, Lagos Island, Lagos

items.name: Little Einsteins Academy
items.short_description: A learning hub focused on early childhood science education, offering sensory play, simple machines, and nature exploration activities.
items.address: 15 Wole Ariyo Street, Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

items.name: Future Innovators Center
items.short_description: Empowering older kids with coding bootcamps, robotics competitions, and advanced workshops in renewable energy and sustainable technology.
items.address: Yaba College of Technology, Yaba, Lagos
